title: Compiler crashed with error: internal compiler error: ../src/librustc_typeck/check/mod.rs:4396: unexpected definition: PrimTy(TyUint(u8))

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
STR:

Compile this revision with nightly. https://github.com/ekr/tls_interop/commit/c3527ed2f34200e3d1795921714b25f265f58512



full report:


```
   Compiling tls_interop v0.1.0 (file:///Users/ekr/dev/tls_interop)
error: internal compiler error: ../src/librustc_typeck/check/mod.rs:4396: unexpected definition: PrimTy(TyUint(u8))

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box<Any>', ../src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:423
note: Run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace.

error: Could not compile `tls_interop`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.


15:41:56|~/dev/tls_interop (master)$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo run
```
